response.response: smtp;552 Requested mail action aborted: exceeded storage allocation Quota exceeded.
response.description: We were unable to deliver your email because the potential recipient does not have sufficient free space in their inbox. Please use a different method to contact the person in question and inform them of the situation.

code.description: The transaction failed permanently. The server will not try to send the message again.

responses.response: smtp;552 5.2.2 The email account that you tried to reach is over quota. Please direct the recipient to https://support.google.com/mail/?p=OverQuotaPerm - gsmtp
smtp;552 5.1.1 <example@zoho.com> Mailbox delivery failure policy error
smtp;552 5.7.1 virus [name] detected by Zoho Mail
responses.description: A known virus was detected in your message content, attachments, and/or URLs. Run the full message and its headers through a virus scanner to identify the source.
The recipient's mailbox is full. This usually happens because the recipient does not use their mailbox often and their mailbox is full.

smtp;552 5.1.1 <example@comcast.net> recipient rejected - extended quota violation
